dc.title: U.S. Department of Labor - Office of Labor-Management Standards (OLMS) - ONLINE PUBLIC DISCLOSURE ROOM: Union Reports and Collective Bargaining Agreements
dc.description: The Office of Labor-Management Standards (OLMS) in the U.S. Department of Labor is the Federal agency responsible for administering and enforcing most provisions of the Labor-Management Reporting and Disclosure Act of 1959, as amended (LMRDA).
